none.recipe-not-craftable-in-hand: This recipe cannot be crafted in hand.
none.not-allowed-character-in-file-name: Character "__1__" can't be part of the file name.
none.too-long-stop-name: The stop name can't be longer than __1__ characters.
none.control-mouse-related: This control has to be mouse related.
none.cant-connect-rolling-stock-not-in-vehicl: Can't connect rolling stock, not in vehicle.
none.cant-connect-rolling-stock-not-in-rollin: Can't connect rolling stock, not in rolling stock.
none.no-stock-to-connect-found: No rolling stock to connect found.
none.cant-disconnect-rolling-stock-not-in-veh: Can't disconnect rolling stock, not in vehicle.
none.cant-disconnect-rolling-stock-not-in-rol: Can't disconnect rolling stock, not in rolling stock.
none.no-stock-to-disconnect-found: No rolling stock to disconnect found.
none.not-enough-space-to-connect-train: Not enough space to connect train
none.you-need-a-better-tool-to-mine-this: You need a better tool to mine this.
none.unknown-command: Unknown command "__1__" type /h or /help for more help about commands.
none.replay-saving-disabled-map-version: Replay saving disabled, map saved with version __1__ and current version is __2__.
none.replay-saving-disabled-mods: Replay saving disabled, map save has different mod settings.
none.cant-select-item-no-place-in-inventory: Couldn't select the quickbar slot, there is no place to put the item in cursor.
none.base-mod-disabled: Base mod is required to run the game, but it is currently disabled, do you want to enable it?
none.cant-ban-not-admin: __1__ failed to ban player __2__ (not an admin).
none.cant-kick-not-admin: __1__ failed to kick player __2__ (not an admin).
none.cant-promote-not-admin: __1__ failed to promote player __2__ (not an admin).
none.cant-demote-not-admin: __1__ failed to demote player __2__ (not an admin).
none.player-is-not-banned: Can't unban __1__, as the player is not banned.
none.color-for-players-only: Color can only be set for players
none.player-banned: Player __1__ is banned in this game.
none.player-limit-reached: The player limit was reached in this game.
none.another-connection-in-progress: Another connection from this peer is in progress.
none.user-verification-required: User verification is required for this game.
none.password-not-provided-or-not-matching: Password not provided or not matching.

command-help.whisper: <player> <message> - Sends a message to the specified player.
command-help.help: <command> - Prints a list of available commands, the optional argument can specify the command that should be described.
command-help.players: - Prints a list of players in the game.
command-help.reply: <message> - Replies to the last player that whispered to you.
command-help.measured-command: <command> - Executes a LUA command (if allowed) and measures time it took.
command-help.bans: - Prints a list of banned players.
command-help.admins: - Prints a list of game admins.
command-help.save: <name> - Saves the current game with the specified name.
command-help.evolution: - Prints info about the alien evolution factor.

gui-auth-server.membership-error: Insufficient membership. Login requires a membership which owns the game. Please buy the game on our website or via retailers (Steam, GOG).
gui-auth-server.authorization-error: Authentication error on the auth server (__1__). Most probably username and password don't match.
gui-auth-server.json-parse-error: Couldn't parse the response from the auth server. This seems to be an internal server error.
gui-auth-server.http-arguments-error: Wrong HTTP request. Seems like an internal error.
gui-auth-server.firewall-error: Communication with auth server failed, probably due to firewall in between.
gui-auth-server.generic-error: Communication with auth server failed: status(__1__) message(__2__).

multiplayer.mod-version-mismatch: __1__: you have version __2__, server has version __3__
multiplayer.mod-crc-mismatch: __1__: Mod contents are different even though versions are the same
multiplayer.script-mismatch: Cannot join. The following mod script files are not identical between you and the server:
multiplayer.failed-to-connect-to-peer: Failed to establish connection with peer __1__.
multiplayer.failed-to-connect: Failed to connect, check log file for details.
multiplayer.not-received-connection-accept-reply: Couldn't establish network communication with server.
multiplayer.waiting-for-respawn: You died. Bad luck. Respawn in __1__ seconds.
multiplayer.address-in-use: The local port __1__ is already used.\nThis could be caused by another instance of Factorio, or by another program using this port.
multiplayer.left-alone-without-map: All other peers left / were disconnect. The map can't be downloaded.
multiplayer.downloading-map-failed: Downloading map from other peers failed. Please try again.
multiplayer.joined-paused-game: You have joined a paused game. You will be able to see the map once the game is unpaused.
multiplayer.you-have-been-dropped: You have been dropped from the game.
multiplayer.server-stopped-communicating: Server stopped communicating, cannot continue in game.
multiplayer.server-disconnected: Server has disconnected, cannot continue in game.
multiplayer.no-server: Lost communication with the server. You are now playing on a LOCAL COPY of the map. You can quit the game and try to reconnect to the server.
multiplayer.own-address-failed: Failed to determine external IP address. Other players might not be able to connect.

gui-tips-and-tricks.title: Tips and tricks
gui-tips-and-tricks.dont-show: Don't show tips and tricks at the start of the game

gui-decider.one-description: Output the specified output signal with a value of 1.
gui-decider.input-count-description: Copy the count of the specified output signal from the input signals.

gui-control-behavior-modes.enable-disable-description: Turn this entity on only when the condition is true.
gui-control-behavior-modes.set-filters-description: Set the inserter filters based on\nthe signals from the circuit network.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-hand-contents-description: Read the item held by the inserter hand\nand send it to the circuit network.\nThe number of items is also sent.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-contents-description: Read the contents of this container\nand send it to the circuit network.
gui-control-behavior-modes.set-requests-description: Set the logistic requests of the chest\nbased on the signals from the circuit network.
gui-control-behavior-modes.use-colors-description: Set the color of the lamp based on color signals.\nIf a color signal has a value greater than 0, the lamp will show that color.\nIf multiple colors are present, only one of them will be used.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-logistic-network-contents-descripti: Read the available items\nfrom the logistic network of this roboport\nand send them to the circuit network.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-robot-stats-description: Read the count of robots\nin the logistic network of this roboport\nand send it to the circuit network.
gui-control-behavior-modes.send-to-train-description: Send the contents of the circuit network to the train,\nso they can be used for wait conditions.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-belt-contents-description: Read the count of items on the belt\nand send it to the circuit network.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-charge-level-description: Send the charge level of this accumulator\nas a percentage between 0 and 100.
gui-control-behavior-modes.close-signal-description:
When the specified condition is true, try to make this signal red and stop any trains from passing.
If a train can not stop in time(signal is orange) or is already passing through(signal is red)
the signal will not stop that train.
Note: the train will very often stop at the signal and not try to find an alternative path even if one is available.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-signal-description:
Read the color of the rail signal and sent
the circuit network signal specified below.
If the rail signal is red because it was closed
from the circuit network, nothing will be outputted.
gui-control-behavior-modes.open-gate-description: Open the gate only when the set condition is true.
gui-control-behavior-modes.read-sensor-description: Send a signal to the circuit network when a player\nis coming towards the gate and it should open.
gui-control-behavior-modes.none-write-description: Don't change this entity's behavior based on the circuit network.

gui-control-behavior-modes-guis.pulse-mode-description-inserter: The signal is sent for only 1 tick when the item is picked up.
gui-control-behavior-modes-guis.pulse-mode-description-belt: The signal is sent for only 1 tick when the item enters the belt.
gui-control-behavior-modes-guis.hold-mode-description-inserter: The signal is sent continuously as long as the inserter is holding the item.
gui-control-behavior-modes-guis.hold-mode-description-belt: The signal is sent continuously as long as the items are on the belt.
gui-control-behavior-modes-guis.red-description: The circuit network signal to send when the rail signal is red\n(a train is passing through the rail signal).
gui-control-behavior-modes-guis.orange-description: The circuit network signal to send when the rail signal is orange\n(a train is planning to pass through the rail signal).
gui-control-behavior-modes-guis.green-description: The circuit network signal to send when the rail signal is green\n(the signal is free).

gui-update.authorization-instructions: Enter your username and password to download updates
gui-update.updates-available-instructions2: Updating may take up to several minutes, please be patient :-)
gui-update.update-failed-firewall: This is possibly caused by a firewall configuration
gui-update.too-old: A newer version of Factorio exists, but it can no longer be obtained using automatic updates. Please download the latest version manually from __1__.
gui-update.automatic-steam-update-message: This version of Factorio is from beta branch that won't be updated automatically. To make sure you get the latest updates select "experimental" beta in Factorio properties in Steam or opt out of betas to get the latest stable release.

gui-user-login.description-mp-game-requires-authenticat: The game you are connecting to requires you to login with your Factorio account.
The game you are connecting to couldn't authenticate your Factorio username and token. Please login again or try later.
gui-user-login.description-mp-browse-public-games-misma: There was a mismatch on the matching server in verifying your username and token. Please login again.
gui-user-login.description-mp-browse-public-games: Please login with your Factorio username and password to browse public Multiplayer games.
gui-user-login.description-mp-username-only: Please insert a username under which you will be known in the multiplayer game (ideally your Factorio username).
gui-user-login.description-mp-create-public-game: Posting a game to the matching server requires you to login with your Factorio account.
gui-user-login.description-mp-connect-to-matching-serve: Connecting to the matching server requires you to login with your Factorio account.
gui-user-login.description-updater: Using the automatic updater requires you to login with your Factorio account.
gui-user-login.description-login-to-existing-account: Please login to your existing Factorio account.
gui-user-login.description-browse-mods: Using the mod portal requires you to login with your Factorio account.
gui-user-login.description-downloading-mods-mismatch: There was a mismatch on the mod portal in verifying your username and token. Please login again.

inventory-restriction.cant-be-used-as-ammo-for: __1__ cannot be used as ammo for __2__.
inventory-restriction.cant-be-used-as-gun: __1__ cannot be used as a weapon.
inventory-restriction.cant-be-used-as-mining-tool: __1__ cannot be used as mining tool.
inventory-restriction.cant-insert-into-assembling-machine-with: You cannot insert anything into an assembling machine when no recipe is set.
inventory-restriction.cant-insert-into-restricted-slot: Only __1__ can be inserted here, not __2__.
inventory-restriction.cant-insert-into-self: You cannot insert an item into itself.
inventory-restriction.cant-insert-into-filtered-slot: Only __1__ can go into this slot, if you want to put something different here, the filter has to be cleared.
inventory-restriction.cant-insert-into-module-slot: Only modules can be inserted into this slot.
inventory-restriction.cant-insert-limit-breached: Cannot insert more items into this slot.

tips-and-tricks.other-furnace-usage-text: A furnace can smelt stone bricks from raw stone and steel from iron plate (the steel recipe needs to be researched).
tips-and-tricks.two-sides-of-belts-text: The left and right side of the transport belt can be used independently for different resources. Inserters put things on the distant part of the belt, and can take items from either side.
tips-and-tricks.rebuilding-text: Stone furnaces can be rebuilt with steel furnaces without the need to mine them first, this is called fast-replacing. This also works for assembling machines, transport belts, inserters chests and similar. It can be used to change direction of transport belt.
tips-and-tricks.electric-network-info-text: Pressing "__CONTROL__open-gui__" on electric pole will open statistics of the electric network it is connected to.
tips-and-tricks.stack-transfer-text: Pressing "__CONTROL__stack-transfer__" will move the whole item stack. Moreover, the transfer command is smart enough to figure out where to move the stack. For instance, performing a stack transfer on an __ITEM__iron-axe__ in the main inventory will have it placed into the tools slot.
tips-and-tricks.inventory-transfer-text: Pressing "__CONTROL__inventory-transfer__" will move all the item stacks of given type between inventories. This can be used, for instance, to transfer all the transport belts from the __ENTITY__wooden-chest__ to the main inventory.
tips-and-tricks.fast-entity-transfer-text: Pressing "__CONTROL__fast-entity-transfer__" allows you to perform a transfer with the selected entity without opening its gui. If the player's hand is empty the transfer happens from the entity into the player's inventory, and vice-versa when player's hand is full. This can be useful in the early stages of the game, in order to manage __ENTITY__stone-furnace__s, __ENTITY__burner-mining-drill__s, etc.
tips-and-tricks.quickbar-text: Every quickbar slot has a shortcut to fetch the item into the cursor. If you already have another item from the quickbar in the cursor, it is returned to the slot it was taken from.
tips-and-tricks.clean-cursor-text: Pressing "__CONTROL__clean-cursor__" will move the item stack from the cursor into your inventory/quickbar.
tips-and-tricks.show-info-text: Pressing "__CONTROL__show-info__" will toggle the extended info overlay.
tips-and-tricks.building-while-running-text: The quickest way to build more stuff in a straight line, like transport belts, pipes or inserters is to hold the "__CONTROL__build__" on the place you want them to be built and run in the desired direction.
tips-and-tricks.building-electric-lines-text: The fast way to build electric line is to drag the build key while moving, the next pole will be built on the furthest possible place automatically.
tips-and-tricks.filter-text: Pressing "__CONTROL__toggle-filter__" on the quickbar slot lets you set what this slot is reserved for. No other item can be placed into this slot, and items of the selected type will be moved into this slot.
tips-and-tricks.copy-paste-text: Using "__CONTROL__copy-entity-settings__" an entity is selected as a copy source. Its settings can then be pasted to a different entity using "__CONTROL__paste-entity-settings__". Copying from assembling machine to requester chests sets it to request the ingredients needed for the recipe, copying between train stops sets the name of the target identical to the name of the source. Copy & paste can be also used on locomotives to duplicate train schedules.
tips-and-tricks.requester-chest-paste-text: Pasting a recipe using "__CONTROL__paste-entity-settings__" from an assembling machine to a requester chest, will set the logistic request to the ingredients for that recipe. For most recipes the requested amount is double the count of required ingredients.
tips-and-tricks.blueprint-book-scrolling-title: Switching blueprints within the blueprint book
tips-and-tricks.blueprint-book-scrolling-text: When you are holding the blueprint book, you can move through the inventory of stored blueprints by using "__CONTROL__cycle-blueprint-forwards__" and "__CONTROL__cycle-blueprint-backwards__".
tips-and-tricks.copy-paste-wagon-slots-text: You can copy the wagon slot filter between inventory slots in the same way as copy-pasting between entities, using "__CONTROL__copy-entity-settings__" to copy a slot filter and "__CONTROL__paste-entity-settings__" to paste it to the selected slot.

achievement-progress.only-when-playing-new-game: This can be only obtained by playing a new game.
achievement-progress.console-command-used: A console command was used. The achievement can't be unlocked in this game anymore.
achievement-progress.not-a-freeplay-map: This achievement can only be unlocked on a freeplay map.
achievement-progress.not-in-peaceful-mode: This achievement can't be unlocked in peaceful mode.

gui-browse-mods.title: Browse mods
gui-browse-mods.author: Author
gui-browse-mods.no-release: Selected mod has no released version
gui-browse-mods.failed-to-connect: Failed to connect to the mod portal

entity-description.assembling-machine-1: Crafts items that require up to 2 ingredients.
entity-description.assembling-machine-2: Crafts items that require up to 4 ingredients.
entity-description.assembling-machine-3: Crafts items that require up to 6 ingredients.
entity-description.logistic-chest-active-provider: Sends its content to the logistic network.
entity-description.logistic-chest-passive-provider: Stores its content for the logistic network.
entity-description.logistic-chest-storage: Long term storage for the logistic network.
entity-description.logistic-chest-requester: Requests specified items from the logistic network.
entity-description.flamethrower-turret: Fires a stream of burning liquid at enemies.
entity-description.power-switch: Used to control the connections of the electric network. Can also be controlled by the circuit network.
entity-description.radar: Scans the nearby sectors, and actively reveals an area around it.
entity-description.beacon: Transmits the effect of modules to nearby structures.
entity-description.arithmetic-combinator: Performs arithmetic operations on circuit network signals.
entity-description.steam-engine: Consumes hot fluid to create electric energy.
entity-description.accumulator: Connects to the electric network and stores electric energy.
entity-description.offshore-pump: Pumps fluid from a body of water.
entity-description.rocket-silo: Used to build and launch a rocket to win the game.
entity-description.rail-signal: Defines the rail system into blocks, allowing multiple trains to run on the same network.
entity-description.rail-chain-signal: Reads the next signals in the path to allow better control of the trains.
entity-description.diesel-locomotive: Runs automated schedules and pulls cargo wagons. Enter the train with __CONTROL__toggle-driving__, and open the train menu with __CONTROL__build__.

entity-name.bob-area-mining-drill-1: Electric Large Area Mining Drill MK2
entity-name.bob-area-mining-drill-2: Electric Large Area Mining Drill MK3
entity-name.bob-area-mining-drill-3: Electric Large Area Mining Drill MK4
entity-name.bob-area-mining-drill-4: Electric Large Area Mining Drill MK5

item-description.speed-module: Increases machine speed at a cost of increased energy consumption.
item-description.speed-module-2: Increases machine speed at a cost of increased energy consumption.
item-description.speed-module-3: Increases machine speed at a cost of increased energy consumption.
item-description.productivity-module: Machine will create extra products at a cost of increased energy consumption and reduced speed.
item-description.productivity-module-2: Machine will create extra products at a cost of increased energy consumption and reduced speed.
item-description.productivity-module-3: Machine will create extra products at a cost of increased energy consumption and reduced speed.
item-description.effectivity-module: Decreases machine energy consumption. Minimum energy consumption is 20%.
item-description.effectivity-module-2: Decreases machine energy consumption. Minimum energy consumption is 20%.
item-description.effectivity-module-3: Decreases machine energy consumption. Minimum energy consumption is 20%.
item-description.satellite: The satellite should be put into the rocket.
item-description.rail: Use to build straight rails manually or through the rail planner.\nThe rail planner can build short paths directly using __CONTROL__build__ or long ghost paths using __CONTROL__build-ghost__.
item-description.copper-cable: Can be used to connect and disconnect electric poles and power switches with __CONTROL__build__.
item-description.red-wire: Used to connect machines to the circuit network using __CONTROL__build__.
item-description.green-wire: Used to connect machines to the circuit network using __CONTROL__build__.
item-description.deconstruction-planner: Marks items for deconstruction by construction robots.
item-description.repair-pack: Used to repair machines by using __CONTROL__build__ with it in hand.
item-description.personal-roboport-equipment: Allows construction bots to work from the player.
item-description.battery-equipment: Stores electric energy for equipment modules.
item-description.battery-mk2-equipment: Stores electric energy for equipment modules.
item-description.night-vision-equipment: Allows the player to see more clearly in darkness.
item-description.energy-shield-equipment: Provides an energy shield to protect the player.
item-description.energy-shield-mk2-equipment: Provides an energy shield to protect the player.
item-description.slowdown-capsule: Reduces the movement speed of affected units.
item-description.valve: A pipe that allows fluid to flow in only one direction

item-limitation.production-module-usable-only-on-interme: Productivity modules are only usable on intermediate products.
item-limitation.item-not-allowed-in-this-container-item: This item is restricted from being put into this container item.

recipe-name.light-oil-cracking: Light oil cracking to petroleum gas
recipe-name.heavy-oil-cracking: Heavy oil cracking to light oil
recipe-name.cobalt-oxide-from-copper: Advanced copper processing with Cobalt oxide
recipe-name.silver-from-lead: Advanced lead processing with Silver ore

technology-description.automation: Key technology for large scale production.
technology-description.construction-robotics: Construction robots can be used to construct and deconstruct entities, and will automatically repair any damage.
technology-description.logistic-robotics: Logistic robots are a flexible alternative to conveyor belts. They transport items between special logistic chests.
technology-description.logistics: Faster and more flexible ways of transportation.
technology-description.solar-energy: Source of free energy, but useless at night.
technology-description.laser-turrets: Laser turrets are an advanced defensive structure, they only require electricity to defend your structures.
technology-description.turrets: Allows the building of basic defensive structures.
technology-description.steel-processing: Allows the smelting of iron plates into steel bars.
technology-description.automated-rail-transportation: Enables building train stops, which are used to setup automated train routes.
technology-description.rail-signals: Enables the organization of multiple trains within a rail network.
technology-description.electric-energy-accumulators: Accumulators are used to store electric energy.
technology-description.character-logistic-slots: Allows player to request items from the logsitics network. These items will be delivered by the logistic robots.
technology-description.character-logistic-trash-slots: Allows player to get rid of unneeded items from his inventory. These items are taken away by the logistic robots.
technology-description.auto-character-logistic-trash-slots: Allows player to set limits on inventory items and any extras are automatically moved into the logistic trash slots.
technology-description.modules: Opens door to the upgrade modules researches.
technology-description.speed-module: Speed modules increase the speed of the machine, but they also increase the energy consumption.
technology-description.productivity-module: Productivity modules allow more products to be produced from the same amount of ingredients, however they increase the energy consumption and reduce the speed of the machine.
technology-description.effectivity-module: Efficiency modules reduce the energy consumption of machines.
technology-description.combat-robotics: Combat robots are equipped with guns to help fight the enemy. The robots are created from capsules and have a limited lifetime. Some of these robots will follow the player, while others are stationary.
technology-description.follower-robot-count: Increases the maximum number of combat robots that can follow the player.
technology-description.personal-roboport-equipment: Unlocks personal roboport equipment that can be inserted into modular armors.
technology-description.landfill: Landfill can be used to fill in any water that is in the way.
technology-description.logistic-robot-storage: Increases the cargo size of logistic and construction robots.
technology-description.logistic-robot-speed: Increases the flying speed of logistic and construction robots.
technology-description.effect-transmission: Unlocks the beacon, which can transmit the effect of modules to nearby structures.
technology-description.bullet-damage: Increases the damage of magazines and defender robots.
technology-description.bullet-speed: Increases the shooting speed of magazines and defender robots.
technology-description.logistic-system: Unlocks special chests that can better control how the logistic robots transport items.
technology-description.rocket-silo: Allows you to launch a rocket into space and win the game.
technology-description.battery-equipment: Unlocks battery equipment that can be inserted into modular armors.
technology-description.battery-mk2-equipment: Unlocks battery 2 equipment that can be inserted into modular armors.
technology-description.energy-shield-equipment: Unlocks energy shield equipment that can be inserted into modular armors.
technology-description.energy-shield-mk2-equipment: Unlocks energy shield 2 equipment that can be inserted into modular armors.
technology-description.solar-panel-equipment: Unlocks portable solar panel equipment that can be inserted into modular armors to power other equipment.
technology-description.personal-laser-defense-equipment: Unlocks personal laser defense equipment that can be inserted into modular armors.
technology-description.discharge-defense-equipment: Unlocks the discharge defense equipment that can be inserted into modular armors. It deals damage in an area around the player.
technology-description.fusion-reactor-equipment: Unlocks the portable fusion reactor equipment that can be inserted into modular armors to power other equipment.
technology-description.power-armor: Power armor has an equipment grid that can be fitted with equipment modules that give unique bonuses.
technology-description.power-armor-2: Power armor 2 has an equipment grid that can be fitted with equipment modules that give unique bonuses.
technology-description.exoskeleton-equipment: Unlocks exoskeleton equipment that can be inserted into modular armors to increase movement speed.
technology-description.automated-construction: Use construction robots to automatically build or deconstruct entities for you.
technology-description.circuit-network: The circuit network allows you to better control machines in your base by interconnecting them with circuit wires and sending special signals.
technology-description.stack-inserter: Stack inserters can move more items at the same time depending on their upgrade.
technology-description.armor-making-3: Modular armor has an equipment grid that can be fitted with equipment modules that give unique bonuses.
technology-description.alloy-processing: Learn how to combine more than one ingredient to make an alloy.
technology-description.chemical-processing: Research into to use and production of chemicals.
technology-description.electrolysis: Electrolysis is uses to separate elements from a liquid.
technology-description.aluminium-processing: Research how to purify aluminium, a fairly strong light weight metal.
technology-description.silicon-processing: Research how to purify silicon for use in electronics.
technology-description.titanium-processing: Titanium is a very strong light weight metal, but hard to separate from its ore.
technology-description.tungsten-processing: Tungsten has a very high melting point, let's research how to refine it another way.
technology-description.nitinol-processing: Nitinol is a Nickel Titanium alloy, let's see what we can use it for.
technology-description.invar-processing: Invar is an Iron Nickel alloy, maybe we can use this for something.
technology-description.tungsten-alloy-processing: Research how to make Tungsten based alloys, this might make it even more useful.
technology-description.steam-engine-generator: Research into improving the efficiency of steam engine electric generators.
technology-description.bob-solar-energy: Source of infinite energy, but useless at night.
technology-description.bob-electric-energy-accumulators: Accumulators are used to store electric energy.
technology-description.bob-robots: Logistic robots are a flexible alternative to conveyor belts.
technology-description.bob-robo-modular: Research into building Roboports in modules.
technology-description.express-inserters: Inserters that are faster than fast inserters!
technology-description.bob-logistics: Faster and more flexible ways of transportation.
technology-description.inserter-stack-size-bonus: Non-stack inserters can move more items at the same time.
technology-description.long-inserters: Allows inserters range to be configured.
technology-description.near-inserters: Allows inserters drop offset to be configured.
technology-description.more-inserters: Allows more inserter rotation configuration options.

achievement-name.getting-on-track-like-a-pro: Getting on track like a pro
achievement-name.it-stinks-and-they-dont-like-it: It stinks and they dont like it
achievement-name.smoke-me-a-kipper-i-will-be-back-for-bre: Smoke me a kipper, I'll be back for breakfast
achievement-name.so-long-and-thanks-for-all-the-fish: So long and thanks for all the fish

achievement-description.steam-all-the-way: Win the game without building any solar panels.
achievement-description.automated-cleanup: Deconstruct 100 objects with the construction robots.
achievement-description.you-are-doing-it-right: Construct more machines using robots than manually.
achievement-description.lazy-bastard: Win the game by crafting no more than 111 items manually.
achievement-description.getting-on-track-like-a-pro: Build a Diesel locomotive within the first 90 minutes of the game.
achievement-description.it-stinks-and-they-dont-like-it: Trigger an alien attack by pollution.
achievement-description.raining-bullets: Win the game without building any Laser turrets.
achievement-description.logistic-network-embargo: Win the game without building any Active provider or requester chests.
achievement-description.you-have-got-a-package: Supply the player by logistic robot.
achievement-description.delivery-service: Supply the player with 10k items delivered by logistic robots.
achievement-description.trans-factorio-express: Have a train plan a route over 1000 tiles long.
achievement-description.golem: Survive a hit of 500 damage or more.
achievement-description.watch-your-step: Get killed by a moving Locomotive.
achievement-description.solaris: Produce more than 10 GJ per hour without the use of Steam engines.
achievement-description.minions: Have 100 combat robots or more following you.
